title: List of chief ministers from the Bharatiya Janata Party
summary: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) is one of the two major parties in the political system of the Republic of India, the other being the Indian National Congress (INC).[1][2] As of 2015, it is the country's largest political party in terms of representation in the national parliament.[3] Established in 1980, the BJP's platform is generally considered as the right-wing of the political spectrum.[4] As of 13 September 2021, 48 BJP leaders have held the position of a chief minister, out of which twelve are incumbent.
